data.quote: Remember that not getting what you want is sometimes a wonderful stroke of luck.
data.author: Dalai Lama

data.quote: A person who never made a mistake never tried anything new.
data.author: Albert Einstein

data.quote: Everything you’ve ever wanted is on the other side of fear.
data.author: George Addair

data.quote: Nothing will work unless you do.
data.author: Maya Angelou

data.quote: To handle yourself, use your head; to handle others, use your heart.
data.author: Eleanor Roosevelt

data.quote: Think little goals and expect little achievements. Thing big goals and win big success.
data.author: David Joseph Schwartz

data.quote: Strive not to be a success, but rather to be of value.
data.author: Albert Einstein

data.quote: The question isn’t who is going to let me; it’s who is going to stop me.
data.author: Ayn Rand

data.quote: The only person you are destined to become is the person you decide to be.
data.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

data.quote: Believe you can and you're halfway there.
data.author: Theodore Roosevelt

data.quote: You don’t learn to walk by following rules. You learn by doing and falling over.
data.author: Richard Branson

data.quote: The only thing worse than starting something and failing… is not starting something.
data.author: Seth Godin

data.quote: Risk more than others think is safe. Dream more than others think is practical.
data.author: Howard Schultz

data.quote: Success is walking from failure to failure with no loss of enthusiasm.
data.author: Winston Churchill

data.quote: Most great people have attained their greatest success just one step beyond their greatest failure.
data.author: Napoleon Hill

data.quote: The only way to do great work is to love what you do. If you haven't found it yet, keep looking. Don't settle.
data.author: Steve Jobs

data.quote: We generate fears while we sit. We overcome them by action.
data.author: Dr. Henry Link

data.quote: Great acts are made up of small deeds.
data.author: Lao Tzu

data.quote: People who are crazy enough to think they can change the world, are the ones who do.
data.author: Rob Siltanen

data.quote: When we are no longer able to change a situation, we are challenged to change ourselves.
data.author: Viktor E. Frankl
